comments.body:
run this both in master branch and here: the result below shows that we get  a little performance improvement
```
master

BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2951 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              3009 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              3022 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2933 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2946 ns/op


here 

BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2842 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2861 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2881 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2847 ns/op
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8           500000              2862 ns/op
```

with higher parallelism (`b.SetParallelism(500)`), there is a much more noticeable impact:

```
master:
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8   	  500000	     10837 ns/op	     262 B/op	       8 allocs/op

PR:
BenchmarkRequestContextMapper-8   	  500000	      3898 ns/op	     295 B/op	      10 allocs/op
```
